task.title: How to Create an AirClassroom Account

context.p: You must have an AirClassroom Account to book a room on AirClassroom. Creating an account is free and simple on AirClassroom!

step.cmd: Go to www.airclassroom.com and click on "Sign Up" at the top right corner.
Choose from sign-up with Facebook, Google, or E-mail. Follow the given instructions on AirClassroom for whichever way you sign up.
After you sign up, make sure to complete your account on AirClassroom.

info.note: You will not be able to reserve a room on AirClassroom without completing your profile. You are required to include your full name, e-mail address, phone number, profile picture, introductory message, agreement to house rules, and payment information. The Shanks Hall hosts will not have access to personal information, such as your e-mail.
